gobblin.data.management.copy.hive

Class HiveDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.hive.HiveDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CopyableDatasetBase, IterableCopyableDataset, PrioritizedCopyableDataset, Dataset
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CleanableHiveDataset, ConvertibleHiveDataset

    @Alpha
public class HiveDataset
extends Object
implements PrioritizedCopyableDataset
    Hive dataset implementing CopyableDataset.

                                                        CopyConfiguration configuration)
                                                 throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: IterableCopyableDataset
        Get an iterator of FileSets of CopyEntity, each one representing a group of files to copy and associated actions.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        targetFs - target FileSystem where copied files will be placed.

      • getFileSetIterator

        public Iterator<FileSet<CopyEntity>> getFileSetIterator(FileSystem targetFs,
                                                        CopyConfiguration configuration,
                                                        Comparator<FileSet<CopyEntity>> prioritizer,
                                                        PushDownRequestor<FileSet<CopyEntity>> requestor)
                                                 throws IOException
        Finds all files read by the table and generates CopyableFiles. For the specific semantics see HiveCopyEntityHelper.getCopyEntities(gobblin.data.management.copy.CopyConfiguration).
        Specified by:
        getFileSetIterator in interface PrioritizedCopyableDataset
        Parameters:
        targetFs - target FileSystem where copied files will be placed.
        configuration - CopyConfiguration for this job. See CopyConfiguration.
        prioritizer - output FileSets must be sorted by this Comparator.
        requestor - the Requestor object that all FileSets should have.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • resolveTemplate

        public static String resolveTemplate(String rawString,
                                     Table table)
        Resolve "$DB" and "$TABLE" in rawString to Table.getDbName() and Table.getTableName()

      • parseLogicalDbAndTable

        protected static HiveDatasetFinder.DbAndTable parseLogicalDbAndTable(String datasetNamePattern,
                                                                     HiveDatasetFinder.DbAndTable dbAndTable,
                                                                     String logicalDbToken,
                                                                     String logicalTableToken)
        Parse logical Database and Table name from a given DbAndTable object. Eg. Dataset Name Pattern : prod_$LOGICAL_DB_linkedin.prod_$LOGICAL_TABLE_linkedin Source DB and Table : prod_dbName_linkedin.prod_tableName_linkedin Logical DB Token : $LOGICAL_DB Logical Table Token : $LOGICAL_TABLE Parsed Logical DB and Table : dbName.tableName
        Parameters:
        datasetNamePattern - Dataset name pattern.
        dbAndTable - Source DB and Table.
        logicalDbToken - Logical DB token.
        logicalTableToken - Logical Table token.
        Returns:
        Parsed logical DB and Table.

      • extractTokenValueFromEntity

        protected static String extractTokenValueFromEntity(String sourceEntity,
                                                    String sourceTemplate,
                                                    String token)
        Extract token value from source entity, where token value is represented by a token in the source entity. Eg. Source Entity : prod_tableName_avro Source Template: prod_$LOGICAL_TABLE_avro Token : $LOGICAL_TABLE Extracted Value: tableName
        Parameters:
        sourceEntity - Source entity (typically a table or database name).
        sourceTemplate - Source template representing the source entity.
        token - Token representing the value to extract from the source entity using the template.
        Returns:
        Extracted token value from the source entity.

      • resolveConfig

        protected static Config resolveConfig(Config datasetConfig,
                                      HiveDatasetFinder.DbAndTable realDbAndTable,
                                      HiveDatasetFinder.DbAndTable logicalDbAndTable)
        Replace various tokens (DB, TABLE, LOGICAL_DB, LOGICAL_TABLE) with their values.
        Parameters:
        datasetConfig - The config object that needs to be resolved with final values.
        realDbAndTable - Real DB and Table .
        logicalDbAndTable - Logical DB and Table.
        Returns:
        Resolved config object.
